title: 13: Holiday Mailbag
description: What's our most surprising team so far? Who's on our All-Rookie team right now? What should the Bulls do? We answer these and other questions from our listeners this week.
itunes:title: 13: Holiday Mailbag
itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, 538, Neil Paine, Geoff Foster, Sara Ziegler
